comments.text:
In short, the errors are all invalid BSD tables on the page. - the

tag in the UL had been removed a while ago (latest code had not been updated within BSD wrapper config, this is now fixed) - the X-UA-Compatible value is a Chrome best practice for HTML5 Confirm valid when no BSD tables on page: http://html5.validator.nu/?doc=http%3A%2F%2Fcfdev21.com%2Fhome.php%3Flocale%3Den_US
comments.creator: devin@crowdfavorite.com
comments.raw_text:
In short, the errors are all invalid BSD tables on the page. - the

tag in the UL had been removed a while ago (latest code had not been updated within BSD wrapper config, this is now fixed) - the X-UA-Compatible value is a Chrome best practice for HTML5 Confirm valid when no BSD tables on page: http://html5.validator.nu/?doc=http%3A%2F%2Fcfdev21.com%2Fhome.php%3Flocale%3Den_US
comments.author: devin@crowdfavorite.com

comments.text: Glad to see we're tracking BSD limitations. Let's not make this specific issue a blocker to launch though (doesn't sound like we've got a good chance of fixing it anytime soon anyway).
comments.creator: posman@eval.ca
comments.raw_text: Glad to see we're tracking BSD limitations. Let's not make this specific issue a blocker to launch though (doesn't sound like we've got a good chance of fixing it anytime soon anyway).
comments.author: posman@eval.ca
stephen.donner@gmail.com
comments.text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> Glad to see we're tracking BSD limitations. Let's not make this specific issue
> a blocker to launch though (doesn't sound like we've got a good chance of
> fixing it anytime soon anyway).

Validation errors are rarely a blocker on any project, FWIW, but they're always good to fix if we can (where here, we're limited).
comments.creator: stephen.donner@gmail.com
